Review.Contenu: Unusable product. No refund given. Will not be purchasing again.

Review.Titre: it wasn't they computer i ordered
Review.Contenu: it wasn't they computer i ordered. 250gb ssd instead of 500gb ssd
Good product, good price but a week to deliver was a bit much. Would use again but not if I needed quickly.

Review.Titre: Day wasted waiting on a parcel that didn't come.
Review.Contenu: All of my interaction with Fox in the Box was very positive.  What let the service down was the courier that they used, Parcel2go.  They asked me to wait in between 8 am and 8 pm and then didn't delivery the parcel till the next day, with no explanation or follow up as to how well their service was.Fox in the Box also did not follow up with a courtesy e-mail to ask how my experience was.  So far, the computer is everything they said it would be.If Fox in the Box could get a more reliable courier, I would improve my rating.

Review.Titre: It works 😀and I will come back 😄.
Initially I had to chase my order
Review.Contenu: Initially I had to chase as my order status hadn’t changed in the site dashboard for a few days. I got a response quickly and they despatched my order straightaway with an apology. Can’t ask for anymore than that.

This is my first order from the store. I ordered the DELL T3610 Workstation E5-1650v2 64GB Quadro K4000 512GB SSD 1TB SATA and they gave me a bluetooth WiFi adapter for free plus a -10% on the price because of my first order!Then we had some issues:Firstly the courier decided to play football with the parcel and the first computer came broken! But the guys from Foxinthebox, in 2 days they setup and sent me a new one. Second, because of the holidays they didn't have memory and SSD's available, so they asked me if I could transfer the parts from the broken one to the new that arrived. With the very precise guidance of Mr Valentin I setup the computer via Whatsup, and managed to sort any settings for the workstation to run smoothly!I've never setup a computer before, but he helped me do that with no problems. I highly recommend the company because they are problem solvers and takes personally the issues that might appears.Very happy for my purchase.
Excellent product, very reasonably priced and the service and delivery was second to none, one very happy customer who will return.
So knowledgeable,  was cert specific about what I needed and why,  dod not try to sell me something for more money than I needed. Real professional

I got a great beginners gaming PC from fox in the box. Worked well, looked great and came with everything I needed at a really good price. After 10 Months however it developed a 'boot loop' and wouldn't load windows. Contacted Fox in the box and after returning the PC they diagnosed it and repaired it and sent it back all under my 1 year warranty.

Fox-in-the-box should use different delivery service - Parcelforce are a JOKE. Phantom delivery attempts cause me untold grief - go to depot and 'hello' parcel not there !Not only have I 'missed' an attempted delivery , but I have wasted MY time and MY fuel to collect (as per Parcelforce website) to still not receive delivery until the following day.

The computer was delivered quickly and efficiently. It arrived on the day and at the time that was promised.The computer had a Xeon CPU (4 core, 8 threads), a SSD / HDD combination, and 64 GB of DDR3 memory. It cannot run Windows 11, which is not a problem since it was not to be expected.The supplied operating system was Windows 10. It was a pleasant surprise to received Windows 10 Pro instead of Windows 10 Home that I expected.

Review.Titre: I had an issue which was fully sorted…
Review.Contenu: I had an issue which was fully sorted out to my satisfaction. I erased my negative review and am so pleased that my trust pilot remarks, were promptly dealt with by FoxintheBox. Highly recommend

Review.Titre: The graphics card arrived in good time…
Review.Contenu: The graphics card arrived in good time considering the Postal strikes. I emailed Foxinthebox asking about a suitable and had a reply in a few minutes, wonderful service in this day and age when it takes most companies at least a day to reply.The best service I have had for years.

The responsiveness to my telephone enquiries was most excellent and demonstrated to me that where possible any changes to the baseline specification would be made where practical. Also alternative options put forward and not just based on cost.Most impressive of all was the superb packaging both PC and monitor were sent in.

Absolutely first class! Rapid delivery and workstation completely as described. I had some issues with performing my own upgrade and they couldn't have been more helpful. Support was forthcoming in the evenings, at weekends and even a Bank Holiday!I wouldn't hesitate to use again or to recommend to friends and colleagues.
Good customer service - answered all questions/ Had a bit of a problem with my computer - all was resolved very fast with a very professional attitude.Thanks FITB.Mr T.Lane

Review.Contenu: Great service and fast answers to any questions I had. I highly appreciate there help and highly recommend if your looking for a second hand server
So far happy with purchase. All as described. Really good contact with the seller. Recommended.
Item as advertised prompt delivery would use again
Highly recommended, went over and above to ensure the correct product was delivered, will purchase again in the future with zero worries on service, a deserving 5 stars

item exactly as advertised dispatched a day later than I expected
